prompt.0: Please translate the following text from German to English. Do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Example: German = "Apfel" -> English = "Apple". Here is the text: "Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten."

source_text.0: Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten.

hypothesis.0:
English:
Felix has had enough: His mother is always off somewhere. But why, nobody will tell him. For Felix it is clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his assumption seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina he sets out to find out the secret of his mother's work. Before he knows it, he is in the middle of his first exciting case as a budding secret agent.(Source)English:
This article has been rated as B-Class.

English:
In 2007, the book Felix 16 by Andreas Schlüter (ISBN 3-570-21842-7) was published by Thienemann. It is the first book in a series about the adventures of a young boy named Felix and his best friend Lina in the world of secret agents. The book is about Felix' tenth birthday, during which he receives a mysterious letter that seems to confirm his suspicion that his mother is a secret agent. Felix and Lina set out to

reference_text.0: Felix is fed up: Mom is always on the go. But nobody will tell him why that is. For Felix, it's clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his suspicion seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of mom's job. Before they know it, the two are in the middle of their first exciting case as budding secret agents.
